Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: X[S] A subtle wave of nausea washes over you.
X[S] \$(person) appears to be slightly pale and nauseated.

(\{ "StoryHost Roo, Wed Sep 4 21:57:14 2019", "StoryHost Roo, Wed Sep 4 22:01:55 2019", "StoryHostess Topsy, Wed Sep 4 22:02:07 2019", "StoryHost Roo, Sun Sep 8 16:09:56 2019", "StoryPuppet Kata, Sun Sep 8 16:12:26 2019", "StoryCoder Roo, Thu Apr 23 11:40:19 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Thu Apr 23 13:24:19 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Thu Apr 23 16:56:31 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Thu Apr 23 17:31:17 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Thu Apr 30 17:26:49 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Mon May 4 22:27:43 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Fri May 8 17:10:56 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Fri May 8 18:40:51 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Fri May 8 19:02:10 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Wed May 20 15:10:46 2020", "Diego, Tue Jun 2 23:04:33 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Sat Jun 6 10:06:33 2020", "Aldur, Sat Jun 6 14:13:55 2020", "Regina, Sat Jun 6 16:23:14 2020", "Isabelle, Thu Jun 18 20:27:48 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Tue Jul 14 09:22:28 2020", "StoryHost Roo, Wed Jul 22 21:24:34 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Wed Jul 22 21:35:55 2020", "Archduke Alonzo, Mon Aug 3 21:42:37 2020", "Lord Trevyn, Sun Aug 9 13:58:53 2020", "Leliana, Wed Aug 26 14:17:40 2020", "Locklan, Wed Mar 3 18:36:01 2021", "Steve, Wed Jun 23 16:06:47 2021", "Santiago, Thu Dec 15 17:21:07 2022", "StoryHostess Topsy, Tue Aug 29 21:09:08 2023", "Farmer Sumner, Thu Nov 2 17:55:34 2023", "Farmer Sumner, Fri Nov 3 19:29:05 2023", "Farmer Sumner, Tue Nov 14 14:23:00 2023", "Valentin, Mon Dec 25 22:03:53 2023" \})

X[S] \{ Weakened and unable to control the heaving, you retch repeatedly but have nothing left to vomit. \| With a sharp and intensely painful heave, you retch repeatedly but produce no vomit. \| With nothing left to give, you fall victim to repeated dry heaves that tear through your gut. \| With a pained groan, you are left breathless by another wave of useless retching. \| Unable to fight against it, another wave of intense and painful retching takes over your body, though there is nothing left to vomit. \}

X[S] \{ A wave of nausea washes over you, sending chills down your spine. \| Nausea rolls through your stomach like a tidal wave. \| A rolling sensation in your stomach overwhelms your senses for a moment. \| Sending a shiver down your spine, the sensation of nausea sweeps through you before subsiding. \| The sensation of nausea sweeps through your body before settling once more. \}

X[S] \{ An intense wave of nausea washes through your body, sending icy cold shivers down your spine. \| A rapid and intense rolling in your gut momentarily takes your breath away. \| You find it hard to talk as another wave of nausea tears through your body. \| The pit of your stomach feels like it drops as you struggle through another wave of nausea. \| The intense rolling waves of nausea tear through your midsection, causing your face to grow pale. \}

X[S] \{ You double-over in pain as your stomach contents erupt in uncontrolled vomiting. \| Unable to control it, you vomit with a painful retch. \| Without warning, you retch before vomiting. \| With a groaning retch beyond your control, the contents of your stomach void themselves in a fit of uncontrollable vomiting. \| After an unsuccessful attempt to fight back the retching, you vomit uncontrollably onto the ground. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{retches and heaves, gasping in between each unsuccessful attempt to vomit. \| grimaces in pain as a wave of dry heaves wracks their body. \| appears weakened and unable to fight against the deep retching and dry heaving. \| nearly collapses in weakness as a wave of retching takes over their body, unable to vomit anything further. \| is unable to vomit, but continues to suffer intense heaving and retching that leaves them breathless. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{grows pale for a moment. \|appears to be nauseated. \|shivers while growing pale in the face. \|makes a facial expression of discomfort. \|pauses for a moment with a nauseated expression before regaining composure once more. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{grows deathly pale as nausea appears to wash over them. \| shivers and pauses with a look of discomfort on the face. \| pauses and seems to struggle with a nauseated expression. \| gasps softly while making a pained, nauseated facial expression. \| struggles with a pained look of discomfort upon the face. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{ retches before uncontrollably vomiting. \|doubles-over in pain before retching and vomiting. \| struggles against the retching before vomiting all over the ground. \| groans and deeply retches, vomiting uncontrollably. \| appears to struggle before a groaning retch results in uncontrolled vomiting. \}
